div.p: This Teaser Text is only shown if the Collection itself is embedded into another Page as a Teaser.
The text is inherited from the Details text above, unless you overwrite it in this field.

p.strong: This is the collection which sits just below the Header and displays the Hero banner images as a slideshow.

div.p: It is placed as the first element in the Page "Main" placement.
It can be used to link to various items, such as Products, Pages, Articles, Videos etc.
The Hero Images will be displayed as screen filling 3:4 ratio on mobile, 1:1 ratio on tablets and 5:2 ratio on the desktop.
Drag teaser items from the Library into the "Items" field below.
Select a Layout Variant at the bottom and notice that the preview to the right changes.Â
Set the slider to the desired output device: Mobile - Tablet - Desktop

p.strong: Please note that the Layout Variant must be set to "Hero Slideshow".
